patthana21.51:1.1: Nosaññojanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Tīṇi pañhā. Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:2.1: Noganthaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.51:3.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:4.1: Nooghaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.51:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:6.1: Noyogaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.51:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:8.1: Nonīvaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.51:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:10.1: Noparāmāsaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.51:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
